      • getIterator

        public org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.iterator.DataSetIterator getIterator(Instances data,
                                                                        int seed,
                                                                        int batchSize)
                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This method returns the iterator. Scales all intensity values: it divides them by 255. Shuffles the data before the iterator is created.
        Specified by:
        getIterator in class AbstractDataSetIterator
        Parameters:
        data - the dataset to use
        seed - the seed for the random number generator
        batchSize - the batch size to use
        Returns:
        the iterator
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
